mapper.select: select ck.* from b_otaorder ord ,b_otaroomorder roomorder,b_pms_checkinuser ck where ord.id = roomorder.OtaOrderId and ck.pmsRoomOrderNo = roomorder.PMSRoomOrderNo and ck.HotelId = roomorder.HotelId and ord.id = #{otaOrderId} order by ck.id desc

select count(1) from b_otaorder ord ,b_otaroomorder roomorder,b_pms_checkinuser ck where ord.id = roomorder.OtaOrderId and ck.pmsRoomOrderNo = roomorder.PMSRoomOrderNo and ord.OrderStatus in (180,190,200) and ck.cardid = #{cardId} and ord.id != #{otaOrderId}
